title: Xara 3D Text Graphics Maker v6 [he33t] [pmsyb]
description:
Xara3D v6.00



Traditional 3D programs are notoriously difficult to use and understand. Not so Xara3D. Unlike much modern 'bloatware' that offers more features than are ever likely to be used, and take an age to learn and understand, Xara3D has been created to perform one job, and performs that job with style, speed, and slick simplicity.

Xara3D is solely designed to create the highest quality 3D text and graphics, such as logos, titles, headings and buttons. It's the perfect way to add impact to your web pages, mailshots and presentations (all images are fully anti-aliased for that smooth, professional quality). Xara3D can also create awesome 3D animations in seconds - GIFs, AVIs and simple Flash movie sequences - and you can even enhance your desktop by saving any animation as a screensaver!

Creating and Importing
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Text headings can use any TrueType font. Nine fonts are included in the trial download and there are 60 on the CD. Simply select the font from the drop down menu and type away, youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll create your first heading in seconds!  
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Full text control, including alignment, sub- & superscript, line spacing, tracking and kerning values for individual characters or over whole selections 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Instant access to full character sets from within the text dialog 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Create non-text headings by importing 2D graphics as Windows metafiles (WMF and EMF) or CorelXARA/Webster files (XAR and WEB) and extruding the outlines - see examples - the Webster drawing package is included free with Xara3D! 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ An automatic design-making tool instantly converts any text heading into a button, board or board with holes 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Full anti-aliasing for the best possible on-screen display quality 

Editing and Applying Special Effects
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Interactive control over the 3D extrude depth - simply click and drag on the image 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Unlimited undo makes experimentation easy 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Real-time 3D positioning around three axes by simply dragging the image on screen  
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Areas of text can be selected, and different attributes such as bevel, color, fonts, textures, animation and text settings applied 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The Style Picker allows you to easily grab any or all of the settings of one image and apply them to another
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ A total of 27 different bevel types with adjustable bevel size - see screenshot 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Interactive, easy-to-use lighting controls (three adjustable light arrows which can be dragged on-screen)
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Flexible interactive controls over the color and/or texture of every part of the image, and the background 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ A total of 37 textures are included in the download, and there are 400+ on the CD-ROM you receive when you purchase. You can also import your own GIF or PNG files 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Textures can be scaled, rotated and colored 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Images can be displayed with front and back faces, or can be made hollow 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Images can be matt or shiny 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Images can have a soft-edged shadow and an intuitive interface allows you to easily alter the shadow blur, transparency and color 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Real-time solid shading with optional error-diffusion dithering for top quality results. 

Animation
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Images can be animated in many different ways (see examples), such as Rotate, Fade, Pulsate, Step, Fade and Swing, using a simple interface 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The Animation Picker lets you easily copy the animation settings of one image to another - see screenshot 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Apply different animations to individual characters or sections of text 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Step-through multi-page animations of different images 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ The number of frames in a sequence, the rotation direction, the speed, pause and number of loops can all be selected through simple controls 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ An animation time line allows you to step through each frame, pause and export a single frame 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Lights and text can be rotated separately 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Great for creating animated buttons. 

Exporting your results
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Outputs JPEG, GIF, BMP, PNG (including full PNG alpha channel), ICO (icon), CUR (cursor), animated GIF, AVI and SWF (vector and bitmap) 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Any 3D animation can also be exported as a screensaver 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Optional background transparency 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Color reduction and palette-optimization for maximum quality with the smallest file size, ideal for web pages and presentations 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Complete control over the image size, including a handy Fit To Width feature (with pixel size shown on screen).
